Package com.atakmap.map.gdal

Class VSIJFileFilesystemHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.map.gdal.VSIJFileFilesystemHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    VSIFileFileSystemHandler
    public abstract class VSIJFileFilesystemHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface defining the behavior of the VSI File System Handler

    • Method Detail

      • getPrefix

        public java.lang.String getPrefix()
        Gets the prefix associated with this handler
        Returns:
        The prefix for this handler

      • open

        public abstract java.nio.channels.FileChannel open​(java.lang.String filename,
                                                   java.lang.String access)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Opens the file
        Parameters:
        filename - path to file to open prefixed with the prefix used in installFileSystemHandler
        access - specifies type of access for the file
        Returns:
        File Handle to the open file or Null if unable to open
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of error

      • stat

        public abstract int stat​(java.lang.String filename,
                         VSIStatBuf statBuffer,
                         int flags)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Gets information about the file
        Parameters:
        filename - path to file to open prefixed with the prefix used in installFileSystemHandler
        statBuffer - The buffer
        flags - Contains information about the file
        Returns:
        0 if successful, non-zero otherwise
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of error

      • convertFileAccessMode

        protected static java.lang.String convertFileAccessMode​(java.lang.String access)
        Convert access mode string from Linux(JNI) to Java. Linux allows access modes like rb+ but Java just wants modes like r/rw.
        Parameters:
        access - The original access string that may need to be sanitized.
        Returns:
        The sanitized access string.

      • installFilesystemHandler

        public static void installFilesystemHandler​(VSIJFileFilesystemHandler handler)
        Installs (registers) VSI file system handler
        Parameters:
        handler - VSI file system handler
